parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.zzzTemporary39
parameters.description: Indicates if a relation is created during S1 incoming handover when                                 PCI conflict is identified.  A relation is created when the attribute is set to 1                                 or the default value.  No relation is created when the attribute is set to                                     0.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011183 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011183 MO instance.
